faqs.title: How do I reset my password?
faqs.content:
To reset your password:
1. Go to the login page
2. Click 'Forgot Password'
3. Enter your email
4. Click the reset link in your email
5. Create a new password

faqs.title: What is your return policy?
faqs.content: We offer 30-day returns on all items. Items must be in original condition. Contact us at support@company.com for return authorization.

faqs.title: How long does shipping take?
faqs.content: Standard shipping: 5-7 business days. Express: 2-3 days. International: 10-15 days. Tracking included.

faqs.title: How do I update my payment method?
faqs.content: Go to Account > Payment Methods > Add New. Enter your card details. Mark as default if needed.

faqs.title: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.content: We accept: Credit cards (Visa, MC, Amex), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Bank transfer.
